title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2019/97 of 15 October 1997 on additional quantities of textile products to be made available to Romania
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2019/97 of 15 October 1997 on additional quantities of textile products to be made available to Romania
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following additional quantity shall be made available to Romania for which it can issue export licenses during the quota year 1997:
- category 7: 250 000 pieces.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 October 1997.
For the Commission
Leon BRITTAN
Vice-President
(1) OJ L 275, 8. 11. 1993, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 198, 25. 7. 1997, p. 1.
